summary: Service-oriented manager who delivers high quality customer service by accurately assessing client needs and recommending policies and products. Excellent investigation and attention to detail skills.

experience.title: Claims Service Manager
experience.description: Manages claims services and delivers solutions via investigation, evaluation, negotiation and settlement of auto claims; supports catastrophe operations; collaborates with vendors and internal teams to facilitate resolution; focuses on member needs and policy understanding.

experience.title: Associate Claims Adjuster
experience.description: Investigates, evaluates, negotiates and adjusts moderately complex auto claims; determines liability and settles/defends in compliance with state regulatory requirements; provides member guidance under limited supervision.

experience.title: Casualty Auto Adjuster II
experience.description: Investigates, evaluates, negotiates and adjusts moderately complex auto claims; applies intermediate knowledge of P&C products and processes; collaborates with team and vendors to resolve issues; supports workload surges and CAT operations as needed.

experience.title: Auto Adjuster
experience.description: Investigate, adjust and settle complex auto, mobile home, boat, and motorcycle claims; diary management; CAT database handling; schedule inspections and tows; issue payments; maintain documentation.

experience.title: Claim Representative
experience.description: Investigate, adjust, and pay claims in a call center environment; provide superior customer service; conduct coverage investigations; interpret policy information; negotiate with glass shops and vendors.

experience.title: Associate Claims Adjuster - Settle
experience.description: Assisted with adjusting and settling loss claims; performed investigations and supported settlement processes.

experience.title: Immediate Response Unit Representative
experience.description: Responded to immediate response unit needs; supported rapid claim assessments and related communications.

education.degree: Master of Science in Criminal Justice
Bachelor of Arts in Criminal Justice
education.school: Our Lady of the Lake University
